description:
If you want to learn about how we can sustainably care for and benefit from nature, start your college journey with Study Hall! Take a college course that starts on YouTube and earn credit before you even apply to college. Find out more at https://link.gostudyhall.com/sust101

When you think about enormous living things, mushrooms and seagrass may not be the first organisms that come to mind. But they should be!

Hosted by: Jaida Elcock (she/her)
----------
Support us for $8/month on Patreon and keep SciShow going!

title: The 5 Largest Living Things
